home-or-tmp

Get the user home directory with fallback to the system temp directory

Useful in cases where the home directory either isn’t set or doesn’t exist.

Install

$ npm install --save home-or-tmp

Usage

```js var homeOrTmp = require(‘home-or-tmp’);

console.log(homeOrTmp); //=> ‘/Users/sindresorhus’

// and if there’s no home directory:

console.log(homeOrTmp); //=> ‘/var/folders/m3/5574nnhn0yj488ccryqr7tc80000gn/T’ ```
